page.title: Pathways Object Properties Pane
page.introduction: For every selected object in the top view the bottom pane of the window displays Object Properties, such as name, linked physiology objects, reaction participants for reaction, clickable links to original databases and publications, comments etc.
page.appearance:
The first column displays the name of the property, the second column displays its value.
No properties can be edited. Blue underlined items are hyperlinks to various resources. Double clicking on it opens a default web browser with the link.
